summary: Mod are not full.All parts will be add
descriptionHtml:
Very big quest mod about ancient nords.Mod have parts.Now it is not full and with time all parts will be available
                                                                      [size=5]            PART I
[/size][size=4]                                                                    KHORAL
[/size]This is a little part of big quest.Khoral this is cave,one of the most important place in quest.It was tomb system for some of ancient nords and place for their rituals,but time and wars destroy this place.Many rooms was filled up with stones or flooded,another was explosed or burned.Books,scrolls,maps and other knowledge missing in this tombs.Some of books survive.But this was not only one place with knowledge about their culture.In Skyrim are some same places.All they was destroyed.Their engineer tried to rebuild all this places.But something happened and they don't do this.Only Khoral was partly restored.Very old books told that in Khoral was 13 tombs.About 2800 dead ancient nords are in this tombs.Also in this tombs are their items,armor,weapons,gold and other.Their culture is not gone.All knowledge are in tombs.Somebody told that he saw man looks like ancient nord.After this in sky around Whiterun appeared something looks like flying rock.Who they are?Are they survive?What they want?You will need to know about it
[size=3][youtube]XvVIHdzEhyU[/youtube]
For better gameplay:Min 32 level,Good computer
[/size][color=#ff0000][size=3]Recommend:CBBE,HD Texture Pack
Please tell me about any bugs.I will fix it[/size][/color]
author: Forknest
